overview:
Dr. Florian Resatsch is managing director and co-founder of servtag, a company focused on object and location-aware information services. servtag was founded in 2007 in Berlin and currently develops its main service Friendticker.

Before founding servtag, Florian Resatsch was project manager at the Institute of Electronic Business (IEB) in Berlin for mobile and Near Field Communication (NFC) projects. His clients included brands such as easyjet, Wall AG and others. Main areas of the projects were affiliate marketing, online marketing, SEO/SEM, mobile business, city advertising, and interactive street furniture.

Furthermore he was research associate at the University of Arts Berlin in electronic business and intensively cooperated with the computer science department of the Technical University Munich in the area of prototype development. His main research focus and personal interest is on ubiquitous computing communication infrastructures.

Florian studied business administration at the University of Augsburg and worked for several major international companies in information technology departments. Florian holds a Ph.D. in computer science from the Technical University Munich.
